feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Community
feed.subtitle: SAP Community Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Accelerators tab not showing
entry.content: Accelerators tab not showing even after selecting the tab in "Configure your page" drop down. Screen shot copied for reference.

entry.title: Why two different buttons for our own account?
entry.content:
On any website, it's customary to find a button in the top right to access your own account. There is such button on SAP Community website too. It has options: My Account, Settings, Subscriptions, Notification Center, Logout. Makes sense.

But where can we find our own content? Ah! For that, there is a tiny button below it. With options: My Content and... Sign Out.

I have so many questions, but mainly: what in tarnation is this and when can this be changed to a human-friendly UI?

entry.title: How can we avoid AI slop posts on SCN?
entry.content:
I don't want to see any AI "assisted" (= copy-pasted from ChatGPT) posts. I'm sure I'm not alone in this, people are getting fed up and justly so. Just one random example.

Adding "Gen AI assisted tag" is helpful but doesn't help to avoid the content. Ironically, tag is at the bottom, so you only see it after scrolling through the post.

Is there a way to mute or block the tag?

If not the tag, is it possible to mute or block specific accounts?

entry.title: SAP WM Pick Quantity Problem.
entry.content:
Hi,

LQUA table as below.

There are records in thw Pick Qty. field; but there is no open TO. Also There are no Req. Numbers (Delivery number), cause they are deleted. How can we fix this problem? We want to use this storage units.

entry.title: 2026: Strange promt on first login to community.sap.com - SAP (universal?) ID.
entry.content:
Note: Today, when I logged in to community.sap.com (with my SAP (universal?) ID), I was promted to
- register a new SAP (universal?) ID
or
- provide an existing account.

I did the later, and was told I need to link (at least) 1 account.
All my 3 accounts where allready linked .
So I just clicked through.

All worked fine, no problem.
Still I thought this was strange / worth mentioning/sharing.

Is SAP bringen back SAP (universal?) ID?!

Happy new Year, yall!
Joachim

entry.title: SAP SD Exam" SAP Certified Associate- SAP S/4 HANA Cloud Private Edition, Sales"
entry.content: Till which date can we give the Exam in old pattern for  " SAP Certified Associate- SAP S/4 HANA Cloud Private Edition, Sales"

entry.title: Opção de categoria de CFOP para comercio
entry.content:
Na configuração da categoria de CFOP não localizei a opção para COMERCIO. O sistema disponibiliza apenas: Industria (cooperat.), Eletricidade, Comunicação, Transporte, Prestação de Serviço, Industria de bens de consumo (coop) e Rural.

Componentes válidos para várias aplicações <> Funções gerais de aplicação <> Conformidade de documentos e relatórios <> Configurações específicas de país/região <> Brasil <> Processamento de documentos eletrônicos <> Saída <> Definir locais de negócio para Brasil

Qual opção eu devo configurar?

entry.content:

the userID used to be : remi-kaimal 
When i login to UniversalID the UserID is remi-kaimal

What could have happened?

entry.title: Transfer Pricing in S/4 HANA Public Cloud 2508
entry.content:
Dear SAP Community,

I am using S/4 HANA public cloud 2508, i have a query regarding transfer pricing in S/4 HANA public cloud, is it available in public cloud, and if no, then what will be workaround.

I'd highly appreciate your prompt response.

 

Regards

Muhammad Yousuf Ali

SAP FICO Consultant

entry.title: Transfer Pricing in coming release in public cloud
entry.content:
Dear SAP Community

I am using SAP S/4 HANA public cloud 2508, i have a question, is transfer pricing available in 2508 version, and if not , then can someone tell me if transfer pricing to be available in next releases.

Looking forward to hear on this subject.

BR

Muhammad Yousuf Ali

SAP FICO Consultant

entry.title: Transfer pricing is available in upcoming release and its impact on already implemented system
entry.content:
Dear SAP Community

I have a question, is there any chance that transfer pricing will be available in S/4 HANA public cloud in upcoming releases, and if yes, then what will be its impact, for e.g what if we have gone live and after some time, TP becomes available in public cloud, then what will be way out to implement TP in existing system.

Your reply will be highly appreciated.

BR

Yousuf

entry.title: Posting Issues When Using Choose Node with Override Styles in SAP Community
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

While creating a new post using the Choose Node option, I noticed that enabling override-styles sometimes changes the appearance or formatting of the post unexpectedly. I’m not sure if this is intended behavior or a configuration issue.

Has anyone experienced problems like inconsistent styling, broken layouts, or preview differences when posting across multiple nodes? Any tips on avoiding these issues would be appreciated.

Reference page:
https://community.sap.com/t5/forums/postpage/choose-node/true/override-styles/true

For testing external links and formatting inside the editor, I also used this sample link:
[removed by moderation]

Thanks in advance for your help!

entry.title: How to remove SAP MDM enrollment on new MacBook Air M4 (private purchase)
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

 

I am a private individual from Poland who recently purchased a brand new, sealed MacBook Air 15" (2025 model with M4 chip) in a private transaction.

 

During the initial setup (after reset), the Mac displays the Remote Management screen pointing to SAP (https://itsupport.sap.com), indicating that the device is still enrolled in SAP's MDM / DEP / Apple Business Manager.

 

This is now my private property – the Mac was bought in original sealed packaging from a private seller. I do have photos of the box confirming it's a new 2025 device, but unfortunately, as it was a cash private sale, I do not have an official invoice or receipt.

 

I have already tried contacting itsupport@sap.com (the email bounced back as invalid for external senders) and called the CIC support line (00 800 491 1525), but without success so far.

 

Questions to the community / SAP experts:

 

1. What is the correct and most effective way for a private owner to request removal of a serial number from SAP's Apple Business Manager / MDM enrollment when the device was bought as new from a private seller?

2. Is there another contact channel, form, or escalation path specifically for such cases (unused/new devices apparently from corporate stock)?

3. Has anyone successfully resolved a similar situation with a brand new 2025 MacBook enrolled in old/corporate SAP MDM? How long did it take and what kind of proof was sufficient?

 

I would be extremely grateful for any guidance, advice, or help from SAP employees/moderators or other community members who dealt with similar device release requests.

 

Thank you very much in advance!

 

Best regards,

entry.title: Can anyone explain what happened with the login process for SAP sites in 2026
entry.content:
Hi 

I have a private user to login to the community. I have had this user for more than 20 years and it has been inherited from SCN and before that from SDN.

I used to login with a user-id P0000xx (not to be confused with a moderne SAP P-user) and I feel kind of attached to this user-id. It is a part of my identity. 

Now in 2026 I can't login with my old user-id any more, but I found that I can login with my email address and still have access to all my old content - All the way back to the launch of SDN in 2003.
I can't see my old user-id any where in my account setting or user settings. What happened?

It is not just nostalgia because I also have assigned s-users from various customers and i have access to a customer BTP accounts  - with the same email address that is now my new SDN user.

Before there was a clear separation with between my accounts. To login I used my p0000xx for the community, I used my email for BTP and I used s-users for me.sap.com.

When I log into the community with this email and then opens a new tab with BTP or me.sap.com it will automatic sign in (SSO). I haven't seen problems with BTP because I get in with the right account, but in me.sap.com it logs in with my community account which doesn't have access to anything in me.sap.com.

The work around is that I log in to the community with edge and me.sap.com with google chrome. Without the SSO I can still login to me.sap.com with the s-user id.

In me.sap.com I see a message
"Effective Jan 20: UID login will be permanently deactivated; only S-User login will be available (KBA: How to reset an S-User ID Password). Change occurs during CET work hours."
Does this mean that the problem with SSO with my email address will be solved on Jan. 20?

Have I lost my old SDN user id for good? 

... and where is SAP Universal ID in all this?

Best regards
Thomas Madsen Nielsen

PS. My first question in SDN in 2003 was why they had left out all ABAP content from the community. Later ABAP came back in full force, but today I often ask the same question. Today the attack on ABAP is more sneaky. They pretend that RAP is ABAP, but in reality it is EML and odata - and it has very little to do with ABAP.

Hi

According to my community user page, I have been a member since 2012, but my first posts are from 2003.
Can this "Member since" error be fixed?

Member page says 2012:

Posts from 2003:

Thomas Madsen Nielsen

entry.title: What is a SAP Credly badge?
entry.content:
Hi 

I'm not even sure this is related to a SAP Webside or if it is a phishing attempt.

I have yesterday and today been spammed from a sender email "SAP via Credly" claiming that I have "earned a badge from SAP".

What is this?

Best Regards 
Thomas Madsen Nielsen

entry.title: Can't add image descriptions to images in community blog posts anymore
entry.content:
Hey, 

I wasn't sure which category to put this in, let me know if there's another place to ask this question. 

I'm trying to write a block post here in the SAP community but I can't click in the text field below an image in the image upload section anymore. I checked it in a new blog post, in the one I've been working on for the past days and older already released ones. 


When I'm opening older blogpost, the description is still there, but I can't edit it (because I can't click in the field either).

Any suggestions on how to proceed or what the issue could be? 

 

Thanks for your help and cheers,
jadga

 

p.s.: I tried the Chrome and Firefox browsers and have logged in and out again several times, doesn't change anything.

entry.title: Join validation error converting universe from Oracle to SQL Server
entry.content: We are in the process of converting our databases and universes from Oracle to SQL Server as required by a vendor.  When I try to validate some of the joins in IDT, I get an arithmetic overflow error that appears to be caused by the validation query using a count(*) instead of a count_big(*).  Is there any workaround or setting I can use to get around this error?
